pages.text: The $(thing)Steam Dynamo$() generates electricity from $(item)Water$() and solid fuel. Its maximum output is 40-120 RF/t depending on the tier. 100mb of water is consumed for every 25 000 RF generated.
Raw materials required: 6 $(item)Copper Ingots$(), 2 $(item)Iron Ingots$(), 3 $(item)Redstone$() and a $(item)Silver Ingot$().

pages.title: Fuels
pages.text: The following fuels can be used in a $(thing)Steam Dynamo$():$(li)$(item)Coal$(): 24 000 RF$(li)$(item)Block of Coal$(): 240 000 RF$(li)$(item)Pulverized Coal$(): 24 000 RF$(li)$(item)Charcoal$(): 16 000 RF$(li)$(item)Block Charcoal$(): 160 000 RF$(li)$(item)Pulv. Charcoal$(): 16 000 RF$(li)$(item)Coal Coke$(): 40 000 RF$(li)$(item)Block Coal Coke$(): 400 000 RF$(p)Any other furnace fuel can also be burned, for (burn time in ticks) x 10 RF if burn time is at least 300 ticks.

pages.title: Energy Generation
pages.text: A $(thing)Steam Dynamo$() has a $(thing)fuel slot$() and a $(thing)water tank$(). When fuel is placed in its $(thing)fuel slot$() and the $(thing)water tank$() is filled with water, the dynamo will start consuming both to generate Redstone Flux. Every unit of fuel yields a certain amount of energy when consumed. Water is consumed in batches of 100 mB to generate 25,000 RF at a time.

The speed at which energy is generated and fuel is consumed depends on how much power can be emitted, and on the dynamo's maximum power output. A basic steam dynamo has a maximum power output of 40 RF/t. This can be increased by upgrading the dynamo to a higher tier, and by installing certain augments.

When an active steam dynamo cannot emit the energy it generates, it will keep working at its minimum power output (a tenth of its maximum power output). Any more energy that is generated in this case is lost. This can be resolved by installing an $(item)Excitation Field Limiter$().

pages.title: Tiers
pages.text: Steam dynamos come in six tiers. These have the following power output limits and augment slots:$(li)Basic: 40 RF/t, no augments$(li)Hardened: 60 RF/t, 1 slot$(li)Reinforced: 80 RF/t, 2 slots$(li)Signalum: 100 RF/t, 3 slots$(li)Resonant: 120 RF/t, 4 slots

pages.title: Augments
pages.text: The following augments can be installed in a $(thing)Steam Dynamo$() to improve it:$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/auxiliary_transmission_coil)Auxiliary Transmission Coil$()$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/fuel_catalyzer)Fuel Catalyzer$()$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/transmission_coil_ducting)Transmission Coil Ducting$()$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/excitation_field_limiter)Excitation Field Limiter$()$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/boiler_conversion)Boiler Conversion$()$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/turbine_conversion)Turbine Conversion$()$(p)Note that the number of augments is limited by the dynamo's tier, with the basic tier having no augment slots.
